00010   Emitter::Emitter(Context* ctx)
00011   : wbuf(),
00012     ctx(ctx),
00013     indentation(0),
00014     scheduled_space(0),
00015     scheduled_linefeed(0),
00016     scheduled_delimiter(false),
00017     in_comment(false),
00018     in_wrapped(false),
00019     in_media_block(false),

00056   // add outstanding delimiter
00057   void Emitter::finalize(void)
00058   {
00059     scheduled_space = 0;
00060     if (scheduled_linefeed)
00061       scheduled_linefeed = 1;
00062     flush_schedules();
00063   }
00064 
00065   // flush scheduled space/linefeed
00066   void Emitter::flush_schedules(void)
00067   {
00068     // check the schedule
00069     if (scheduled_linefeed) {
00070       string linefeeds = "";
00071 
00072       for (size_t i = 0; i < scheduled_linefeed; i++)
00073         linefeeds += ctx ? ctx->linefeed : "\n";
00074       scheduled_space = 0;
00075       scheduled_linefeed = 0;
00076       append_string(linefeeds);
00077 
00078     } else if (scheduled_space) {
00079       string spaces(scheduled_space, ' ');
00080       scheduled_space = 0;
00081       append_string(spaces);
00082     }
00083     if (scheduled_delimiter) {
00084       scheduled_delimiter = false;
00085       append_string(";");
00086     }
00087   }
00088 
00089   // prepend some text or token to the buffer
00090   void Emitter::prepend_output(const OutputBuffer& output)
00091   {
00092     wbuf.smap.prepend(output);
00093     wbuf.buffer = output.buffer + wbuf.buffer;
00094   }
00095 
00096   // prepend some text or token to the buffer
00097   void Emitter::prepend_string(const string& text)
00098   {
00099     wbuf.smap.prepend(Offset(text));
00100     wbuf.buffer = text + wbuf.buffer;
00101   }
00102 
00103   // append some text or token to the buffer
00104   void Emitter::append_string(const string& text)
00105   {
00106     // write space/lf
00107     flush_schedules();
00108 
00109     if (in_comment && output_style() == COMPACT) {
00110       // unescape comment nodes
00111       string out = comment_to_string(text);
00112       // add to buffer
00113       wbuf.buffer += out;
00114       // account for data in source-maps
00115       wbuf.smap.append(Offset(out));
00116     } else {
00117       // add to buffer
00118       wbuf.buffer += text;
00119       // account for data in source-maps
00120       wbuf.smap.append(Offset(text));
00121     }
00122   }
00123 
00124   // append some white-space only text
00125   void Emitter::append_wspace(const string& text)
00126   {
00127     if (text.empty()) return;
00128     if (peek_linefeed(text.c_str())) {
00129       scheduled_space = 0;
00130       append_mandatory_linefeed();
00131     }
00132   }
00133 
00134   // append some text or token to the buffer
00135   // this adds source-mappings for node start and end
00136   void Emitter::append_token(const string& text, AST_Node* node)
00137   {
00138     flush_schedules();
00139     add_open_mapping(node);
00140     append_string(text);
00141     add_close_mapping(node);
00142   }

00144   // HELPER METHODS
00145 
00146   void Emitter::append_indentation()
00147   {
00148     if (output_style() == COMPRESSED) return;
00149     if (output_style() == COMPACT) return;
00150     if (scheduled_linefeed && indentation)
00151       scheduled_linefeed = 1;
00152     string indent = "";
00153     for (size_t i = 0; i < indentation; i++)
00154       indent += ctx ? ctx->indent : "  ";
00155     append_string(indent);
00156   }
00157 
00158   void Emitter::append_delimiter()
00159   {
00160     scheduled_delimiter = true;
00161     if (output_style() == COMPACT) {
00162       if (indentation == 0) {
00163         append_mandatory_linefeed();
00164       } else {
00165         append_mandatory_space();
00166       }
00167     } else if (output_style() != COMPRESSED) {
00168       append_optional_linefeed();
00169     }
00170   }
00171 
00172   void Emitter::append_comma_separator()
00173   {
00174     scheduled_space = 0;
00175     append_string(",");
00176     append_optional_space();
00177   }
00178 
00179   void Emitter::append_colon_separator()
00180   {
00181     scheduled_space = 0;
00182     append_string(":");
00183     append_optional_space();
00184   }
00185 
00186   void Emitter::append_mandatory_space()
00187   {
00188     scheduled_space = 1;
00189   }
00190 
00191   void Emitter::append_optional_space()
00192   {
00193     if (output_style() != COMPRESSED && buffer().size()) {
00194       char lst = buffer().at(buffer().length() - 1);
00195       if (!isspace(lst) || scheduled_delimiter) {
00196         append_mandatory_space();
00197       }
00198     }
00199   }
00200 
00201   void Emitter::append_special_linefeed()
00202   {
00203     if (output_style() == COMPACT) {
00204       append_mandatory_linefeed();
00205       for (size_t p = 0; p < indentation; p++)
00206         append_string(ctx ? ctx->indent : "  ");
00207     }
00208   }
00209 
00210   void Emitter::append_optional_linefeed()
00211   {
00212     if (output_style() == COMPACT) {
00213       append_mandatory_space();
00214     } else {
00215       append_mandatory_linefeed();
00216     }
00217   }
00218 
00219   void Emitter::append_mandatory_linefeed()
00220   {
00221     if (output_style() != COMPRESSED) {
00222       scheduled_linefeed = 1;
00223       scheduled_space = 0;
00224       // flush_schedules();
00225     }
00226   }
00227 
00228   void Emitter::append_scope_opener(AST_Node* node)
00229   {
00230     append_optional_space();
00231     flush_schedules();
00232     if (node) add_open_mapping(node);
00233     append_string("{");
00234     append_optional_linefeed();
00235     // append_optional_space();
00236     ++ indentation;
00237   }
00238   void Emitter::append_scope_closer(AST_Node* node)
00239   {
00240     -- indentation;
00241     scheduled_linefeed = 0;
00242     if (output_style() == COMPRESSED)
00243       scheduled_delimiter = false;
00244     if (output_style() == EXPANDED) {
00245       append_optional_linefeed();
00246       append_indentation();
00247     } else {
00248       append_optional_space();
00249     }
00250     append_string("}");
00251     if (node) add_close_mapping(node);
00252     append_optional_linefeed();
00253     if (indentation != 0) return;
00254     if (output_style() != COMPRESSED)
00255       scheduled_linefeed = 2;
00256   }
